name: Chiroform Treadmill
descr:
High-Tec Treadmill from Chiroform to a favorable price.

Description:
Motor(Fancooled): 6HP(Peak) 3HP(Continuous)
USA Brand Leeson Motor
Speed:  1 - 22km/hr
Incline  1 - 20%
LCD Display: Displays: TIME, DISTANCE, PULSE,
CALORIES, SPEED
Quick buttons: One-touch incline buttons: 0,5,10,15 degrees
One-touch speed buttons: 4, 8, 12, 16 km/hr
Workout Programs: 51 programs in total  5 preset programs x
(each program with 10 different levels) 1 Manual program
Body Colors: Silver and black                                                           Heart Rate Monitor: Yes, Handle Bar sensors

2 years of warranty.
